WorkflowConfiguration.DisplayName: Self Monitoring - Monitor Service Performance Counters Thresholds

ActivityNode.Notes: If this execution fails, execute the contained workflow nodes.

VariableReference.DisplayPath: Workflow.Orchestrator Service Private Bytes Monitoring.Error Information
Workflow.Orchestrator Service Private Bytes Monitoring.Error Information

SqlCommandText.FormattedCode: SELECT C.ObjectName,C.CounterName, C.InstanceName, S.TIAServerName, avg(P.Value)/1000000 Value FROM TIAReport.PerformanceData P INNER JOIN TIAReport.ConfigurationItem CI ON CI.ConfigurationItemId = P.ConfigurationItemId INNER JOIN TIAReport.PerformanceCounter C ON C.PerformanceCounterId = P.PerformanceCounterId INNER JOIN TIAReport.TIAServerName S ON S.TIAServerNameId = P.TIAServerNameId where C.ObjectName = 'Process' and C.CounterName = 'Private Bytes' and InstanceName like 'Tidal.Automation.Server%' and S.TIAServerName = '{0}' and TimeGenerated > to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') group by c.ObjectName,c.CounterName,c.InstanceName,S.TIAServerName ;

SqlCommandText.FormattedCode: SELECT C.ObjectName,C.CounterName, S.TIAServerName, avg(P.Value) Value FROM TIAReport.PerformanceData P INNER JOIN TIAReport.ConfigurationItem CI ON CI.ConfigurationItemId = P.ConfigurationItemId INNER JOIN TIAReport.PerformanceCounter C ON C.PerformanceCounterId = P.PerformanceCounterId INNER JOIN TIAReport.TIAServerName S ON S.TIAServerNameId = P.TIAServerNameId where C.ObjectName = 'Cisco Process Orchestrator' and C.CounterName like '%Process Instances' and S.TIAServerName = '{0}' and TimeGenerated > to_date('{1}','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') group by c.ObjectName,c.CounterName,S.TIAServerName ;

SqlCommandText.FormattedCode: SELECT C.ObjectName,C.CounterName, C.InstanceName, S.TIAServerName, avg(P.Value)/1000000 AS Value FROM TIAReport.PerformanceData AS P WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TIAReport.ConfigurationItem AS CI ON CI.ConfigurationItemId = P.ConfigurationItemId INNER JOIN TIAReport.PerformanceCounter AS C ON C.PerformanceCounterId = P.PerformanceCounterId INNER JOIN TIAReport.TIAServerName AS S ON S.TIAServerNameId = P.TIAServerNameId where C.ObjectName = 'Process' and C.CounterName = 'Private Bytes' and InstanceName like '%Tidal.Automation.Server%' and S.TIAServerName = '{0}' and TimeGenerated > '{1}' group by c.ObjectName,c.CounterName,c.InstanceName,S.TIAServerName
